dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a logical and methodical mindset, analyzing facts and data to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach problems with a creative and outside-the-box mindset, generating innovative solutions that might not be immediately apparent.

dimensions.label: Public Speaking Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin speak in public?

options.description: Your FarTwin will speak with confidence and authority, articulating their thoughts clearly and persuasively.
Your FarTwin will speak in a reserved and measured tone, choosing their words carefully to avoid overwhelming or intimidating others.

dimensions.label: Learning Preference
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual means, such as images, videos, and diagrams.
Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experiences and practical applications.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, making an effort to connect with others and build relationships.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved and introverted, preferring smaller groups or one-on-one interactions.

dimensions.label: Time Management Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach time management with a structured and organized mindset, prioritizing tasks and sticking to schedules.
Your FarTwin will be more flexible and adaptable when it comes to time management, adjusting to changing circumstances and deadlines.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach innovation and new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be open to new ideas and perspectives, embracing change and taking calculated risks.
Your FarTwin will approach innovation with caution, preferring to build upon existing ideas and solutions rather than taking significant risks.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work collaboratively with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be a team player, working closely with others to achieve common goals and sharing knowledge and expertise.
Your FarTwin will approach collaboration with a competitive mindset, focusing on individual achievements and results rather than teamwork.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk-taking?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be willing to take significant risks in pursuit of goals and opportunities.
Your FarTwin will approach risk with caution, preferring to avoid taking unnecessary risks and sticking to more predictable paths.
